title: How to write a good compare and contrast essay? What should the introduction be - Quora

response.answer_text: You decide on your introduction, based on your proposed content for your comparison and contrast essay. Pick two people, ideas, things, or whatever that are related and compare them in terms of similarities and differences—for example, apples and oranges are both fruits, but can easily be compared and contrasted. Once you have decided on your topic, then decide on your thesis statement—that’s essential the point of your essay. That will be part of your introduction. Keep writing!!
